snippet: Efforts are growing to market to the fan-girls of the worlds of sci-fi, fantasy and other genres typically dominated by men.
abstract: New York Comic Con showcases the growing importance of women in the industry, both as entrepreneurs and consumers.
lead_paragraph: Efforts are growing to market to the fan-girls of the worlds of sci-fi, fantasy and other genres typically dominated by men.

headline.seo: At New York Comic Con, Outfitting Female Fans
headline.main: At New York Comic Con, Outfitting Female Fans
headline.print_headline: At New York Comic Con, Female Fans Find New Products Tailored for Them
